pages.text: The Shrine Lamp is a decent decorative light source. Additionally, the upper half of the lamp can store Power Items from the player; you can right-click the upper half of lamp to open its GUI, where you can insert or extract Power.

You can also specify a buff effect for the lamp; the lamp will then consume Power Point to apply those effects to surrounding maids. $(br2)The Shrine Lamp can also auto-collect and store Power Items on the ground within a 3-block radius.
